lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee (IOC) will not ban Russia from participating in the Rio Games and has not suspended the Russian Olympic Committee, the Russian state news agency TASS quoted an IOC source as saying on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: IOC Will Not Ban Russia From Rio Games: TASS Cites IOC Source
headline.main: IOC Will Not Ban Russia From Rio Games: TASS Cites IOC Source

snippet: The International Olympic Committee (IOC) will not ban Russia from participating in the Rio Games and has not suspended the Russian Olympic Committee, the Russian state news agency TASS quoted an IOC source as saying on Sunday....
